name: DS Game Maker Project
summary: Learn about .DSGM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Compiled DS Game Maker games can be run on a Nintendo DS using a DS Homebrew Kit. They can also be run with a Nintendo DS emulator such as NO$GBA.
DSGM files were introduced with DS Game Maker Version 5. Previous versions of the software use .XDS files to save projects.
NOTE: Invisionsoft DS Game Maker is no longer developed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
